head.title: Remove {{EXT}} Pages in {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Remove or delete a single page or collection of pages from a {{EXT}} file in {{ProgLang}} by reversing the pages order using the documents merger API.

header.title: Remove {{EXT}} Pages in {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Remove or delete a single page or collection of specific pages from a {{EXT}} file using documents merger API for {{ProductName}} applications.

about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.h1: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/merger/{{ProductCode}}/) offers a simple solution to safely merge & split between a wide range of document formats including PDF, Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote), OpenDocument, HTML, images and many others within {{ProductName}} applications. By adding just a few lines of the code, perform several document operations such as move, remove, rotate, swap, extract or change the orientation of pages within the documents. The documents merging API also supports previewing document pages as an image to analyse the document structure, formatting and content on the page.
about.h2: GroupDocs.Merger APIs are well supported on all major operating systems and Java versions including {{Runtime}}.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/merger/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProgLang}} developers to delete a single or a number of particular pages within a {{EXT}} file by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Initialize **RemoveOptions** with page numbers to remove.
content_left.step_2: Create new instance of **Merger** and pass source document path as a constructor parameter.
content_left.step_4: Call **save** and specify the file path to save the resultant document.

content_right.description: {{ProductFullName}} APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_right.step_4: Download the latest version of {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

demos.h1: Remove {{EXT}} file pages right now by visiting [GroupDocs.Merger Live Demos](https://products.groupdocs.app/splitter/remove-pages/{{ext}}) website.
demos.h2: The live demo has the following benefits.

more_formats.title: Remove Pages From Other Document Formats
more_formats.content: {{ProductName}} documents merger & split API for file formats and images. Remove some of the popular file formats as stated below.
